ARABIC: أَفَلَا يَنظُرُونَ إِلَى ٱلْإِبِلِ كَيْفَ خُلِقَتْ

ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_0: Have they not looked at the camel - how it was created
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_1: Do they not then ponder how the clouds were formed;
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_2: Do (these unbelievers) not observe the camels: how they were created?
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_3: Have they not looked at how the camel is created,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_4: So do they not see the camel – how it has been created?
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_5: Do they not look at the camels, how they are created
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_6: Will they not then consider the camels, how they are created?
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_7: What, do they not consider how the camel was created,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_8: Will they not regard the camels, how they are created?
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_9: Do they never reflect on the camels and how they were created,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_10: Look they not at the camels, how they are created?
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_11: Do they not observe the camel, [to see] how it has been created?
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_12: Do they not look at the Camels, how they are made?-
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_13: Do they not look at the camels, how they are created?
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_14: What, do they not reflect upon how the camel was created?
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_15: Do they not look at the camels—how they are created?
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_16: Then do they not look at the camels - how they are created?
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_17: [88:17] Will they, the Meccan disbelievers, not consider, by way of reflection, the camels, how they are created?
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_18: When the Prophet (pbuh) informed them of this, the disbelievers of Mecca said: "Bring us a sign to prove that Allah has sent you to us as a Messenger". Therefore Allah said: (Will they not regard the camels, how they are created) with their strength and power, carrying burdens that no one else can carry?
